WEATHER FORECAST FOR 06 NOVEMBER 2024
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 06 November 2024
Showers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  several  places
Southern and Western provinces during the evening or night. Fairly heavy showers above 50mm
are likely at some places.
Several spells of light showers may occur in Northern and North-western provinces.
